name: leak-finder
description: Inspired by @burakeregar (https://x.com/burakeregar/status/2013615136502616225). Scans repositories for exposed secrets and credentials. Detects 23+ secret types including AWS keys, Stripe tokens, GitHub PATs, private keys, and database URIs.

repo_url.description: URL of the git repository to scan (use this OR path)

path.description: Local directory path to scan (use this OR repo_url)

branch.description: Branch to scan (defaults to default branch)

deep_scan.description: Whether to scan git history for secrets

rotated_keys.description: List of key prefixes that have been rotated (will be marked as info severity)

exclude.description: List of directory names to skip during scanning (in addition to built-in exclusions)
